item.title: Broccoli pizza crust
item.description: Preheat the oven: Set the oven to 220Â°C (425Â°F). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease it with oil. Prepare the broccoli: Steam the chopped broccoli (including stems if using) until tender. Pulse it in a food processor until finely grated. Transfer the grated broccoli to a cheesecloth or clean kitchen towel and squeeze out as much water as possible to ensure a dry mixture. Make the dough: In a bowl, mix the grated broccoli, egg, 2 tbsp mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.

item.title: Malai broccoli
item.description: Prepare the Cashew Paste: Soak the cashews in warm water for 20 minutes until softened. Drain and add them to a blender along with the cold water. Blend until smooth and creamy, forming a thick cashew paste. Set aside. Prepare the Broccoli: Blanch the broccoli florets in boiling salted water for 2 minutes. Transfer immediately to ice water for 2-3 minutes to stop cooking. Drain and gently squeeze out excess water.
